::Prowl/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/Breakdown/Pyro/Punch/Scattershot/Scavanger/Hiss
::

Prowl looks back at Iron Raptor's pleading look as she puts her hand on his 
cheek, indicision entering his optics. His hand goes up to hers, holding it 
to his cheek.

"I am thinking with my head," he says softly, the fact that Tavatron had 
jogged up to them not regestering in his mind, "I have a way to get out, but 
if they somehow do capture you, it won't work."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Allright, Maximals, playtime's over!" Reptilica's voice sounds as he enters 
the torture chambers, followed by Bloodystrike, Breakdown, Pyro, Punch, and 
Scattershot. Autoguns emerge from the cealing, aiming at Dinobot, the 
remaining uncloaked Maximal.

"Allright, everyone, you're going to uncloak! If you don't, we'll simply kill 
you all," Reptilica says, smiling evilly as the five bots behind him hold 
their weapons ready, the autoguns reinforcing his words even more.

Prowl growls silently. This was it.... His plan would need to prove itself...

"Ok, everyone, uncloak," he says quetly to Iron Raptor and Tavatron, 
deactivating his own cloaking device as he reaches into a storage compartment.

Reptilica jumps back as Prowl appears right in front of him, the Maximal 
holding something in his hand. The Alliance member aims his gun at Prowl's 
head.

"I knew you would cooperate, Maximal. It was smart of you, though, now your 
death might actually be kind," Reptilica says, his evil smile still on his 
face.

"Not so fast, Reptilica," Prowl says calmly, holding up the black device in 
his hand. It was a small tube, with a button on top and a hand grip for easy 
holding. Prowl's thumb was over the button, "Your troops fire and we all go 
up in flames."

The grin whipes itself off of Reptilica's face, the Alliance member growling 
at Prowl.

"And what makes you think that tube will blow us up, Maximal?" Reptilica 
says, keeping his gun aimed at Prowl's head.

"Simple," Prowl calmly responds, relaxing his stance into a casual position, 
"Me and Dinobot paid a little visit to the engine room on our way here," he 
lies, "Its filled with explosives. This is the detonator." Prowl moves his 
thumb slowly over the button, looking as he might press it at any time.

"Allright, Maximal," Reptilica growls, "You're free to go. Just give me the 
device."

Prowl laughs. He wasn't about to fall for that. "I don't think so. I'll give 
it to you when me and my friends are safely outside your base. At the edge of 
the clearing. If one shot hits any of us untill then, I'm sure Zardus won't 
be happy."

Reptilica snarls at the Maximal in front of him, ready to yell out in rage. 
"You'd kill us all, you fool! Including your 'friends'."

A nervious feeling runs through Prowl. "I'm sure we'd all be willing to give 
our lives to defeat you. Isn't that right, Dinobot?"

Prowl waits for Dinobot's responce, hoping the fellow Maximal would answer 
yes. Reptilica turns his head at Dinobot, his eyes narrowing.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Hiss and Scavanger yell in pain as shots hit them. They were facing three 
bots, and that wasn't the funnest thing in the world.

"Retreat, Maximals, just like your friends!" Scavanger yell as he and Hiss 
continue to fire at Arcangel and Icedragon, the defences focusing their fire 
on the other attacker.
